title: "What did Aldus hatch?", a poem NOT by Chris Lozos
content:
Surely, I fear no Sword  
And love Typophile Board  
Taking my Lord's Word,  
I divorced Ms Wor(l)d  
To hold the record,  
I ran and ran to catch  
what Aldus did hatch!  
the palette with no match  
that watches what I patch  
To Windows, what a Latch!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021030010im_/http:/typophile.com/files/fatbelt_liam2_3978.gif)
author: AzizMostafa

comments.content:
Through the window of your mind  
the ghost of Aldus is enshrined,  
Let the Word of Aziz all be said,  
I too see wisdom in his head  
To catch or hatch your Windows patch,  
Your IE browser can make you scratch.

ChrisL

PS: Hip! Hip! Away!
Thanks ChrisL for your warning + reading my mind.
